meanings.sent1: After leaving the room, his reentry caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her reentry into the conversation was seamless.
meanings.sent3: His reentry into the game was like a hero returning to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The reentry of sunlight through the window brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The reentry of the missing puzzle piece completed the picture.

meanings.definition: The process of returning to Earth's atmosphere from space.
meanings.sent1: The astronaut's reentry into the atmosphere was a critical phase of the mission.
meanings.sent2: The spacecraft's reentry was smooth and successful.
meanings.sent3: The reentry of the spaceship was like a shooting star descending to Earth.
meanings.sent4: The reentry of the capsule was a fiery spectacle in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The reentry of the space shuttle marked the end of the space journey.

meanings.definition: The act of rejoining a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Her reentry into the team brought new energy and ideas.
meanings.sent2: The employee's reentry into the company was welcomed by all.
meanings.sent3: His reentry into the club was met with cheers and applause.
meanings.sent4: The reentry of the former member boosted team morale.
meanings.sent5: The reentry of the volunteer group made a positive impact on the community.
